hidden_blade.name: Hidden Blade
hidden_blade.desc:
Pull out a hidden blade and quickly stab your opponent, dealing a percentage of your opponents health while also applying a bonus poison.
[*Note: Requires Authority Ensign Origin's Inquisition Division]

glorious_charge.name: Glorious Charge
glorious_charge.desc:
Yell with valor and courage, increasing the speed of those who are in your party by 20 seconds and making them unknockable for 10 seconds.
[*Note: Requires Authority Ensign Origin's Command Division.]
